response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and potential for those who appreciate its true worth. Considering its exceptional qualities and rarity, I propose a price of $750,000 for this product. I believe this offer reflects the value I place on it while also allowing you to make a significant investment in something truly special. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 750000}
